directions: Stir 3/4 cup peanut butter, 2 tablespoons coconut oil, and 1 tablespoon honey together in a bowl. Mix chocolate-hazelnut spread, cocoa powder, 1/4 cup coconut oil, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 tablespoon peanut butter, and stevia powder together in a separate bowl.
Ladle peanut butter mixture into muffin cups; top each with chocolate mixture. Refrigerate or freeze until set.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®), or more to taste
title: Peanut Butter Cups with Health Benefits!
